text:
Last Updated Monday, January 23, 2017 Advertisement 
The Data Entry or Computer Operator Jobs mean 'The process of entering / updating data into a computerized database or proper documents (Example - MS Word) â€™. There are lot of Data Entry / Computer Jobs available in Central / State Govt Departments and various Public Sector / Govt Undertaking Organizations & Institutions. Indian Jobs Seeker who want Data Entry Jobs and Computer Operator Jobs in Government Sector - Get Latest Data Entry Govt Jobs and Computer Based government Jobs List available in the following table. The Table listing Upcoming and Latest Govt Jobs of Data Entry / Computer Vacancies 2016, Last Date for Apply and Recruitment Notifications Link. 
Minimum Educational Qualification: Matriculation or 12th Class Pass with Computer Knowledge (Diploma in Computer Application or equivalent).
